summary: This is a docket notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It records the filing of a motion order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for bail, filed on April 27, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant who filed a motion for bail, which was denied by the court order documented in this filing.

events.title: Bail Motion Denied for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals filed a motion order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for bail.

keyFacts: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals denied Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for bail on April 27, 2021.
The document is a formal court docket notice recording this legal action in the case United States v. Maxwell.
The case numbers referenced are 21-58 and 21-770, indicating it is part of her appellate proceedings.
